00068   class incompatibleUnits: public exception
00069   {
00070     public:
00071       const char* msg;
00072       incompatibleUnits(SassUnit a, SassUnit b)
00073       : exception()
00074       {
00075         stringstream ss;
00076         ss << "Incompatible units: ";
00077         ss << "'" << unit_to_string(a) << "' and ";
00078         ss << "'" << unit_to_string(b) << "'";
00079         msg = ss.str().c_str();
00080       };
00081       virtual const char* what() const throw()
00082       {
00083         return msg;
00084       }
00085   };
